org.xbmc.api.object

Class Album

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xbmc.api.object.Album
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, ICoverArt, INamedResource

    public class Album
extends java.lang.Object
implements ICoverArt, java.io.Serializable, INamedResource
    The album class keeps the basic album information from the album table as well some of the extended info from the albuminfo table.
    Author:
    freezy
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
